title: Not only to save our jobs

video_links.name: Not only to save our jobs

brief_description: Shows how a group of people at a small Melbourne manufacturing company acted to overcome the threat of losing their jobs by setting up a new form of organisation based on worker participation in ownership and decision-making. The effects on employees’ attitudes and work relationships are shown.
